arts.ttl: Chelsea beat Forest to end Postecoglou's time at City Ground
arts.sum: Chelsea score three second-half goals to beat Nottingham Forest at the City Ground and trigger the sacking of manager Ange Postecoglou just 17 minutes after the game ends.

arts.sum: Postecoglou was relieved of his duties following less than six weeks at Forest.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest ruthlessly sack Postecoglou just 19 minutes after Chelsea hammering
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest announce the sacking of head coach Ange Postecoglou just 19 minutes after Saturday's 3-0 defeat at the hands of Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Chelsea ratings: Neto earns 8/10 in win at Forest that got Ange fired
arts.sum: Pedro Neto starred in Chelsea's 3-0 victory at Nottingham Forest that ultimately cost Ange Postecoglou his job after just eight games in charge.

arts.ttl: 'We saw him' - What Ange Postecoglou did in the tunnel immediately after losing to Chelsea
Ange sacked by Forest minutes after Chelsea loss
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest have sacked Ange Postecoglou just 19 minutes after the team's defeat to Chelsea at the City Ground.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecolgou sacked: Nottingham Forest wield axe after Chelsea loss

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou sacked just minutes after Chelsea beat Nottingham Forest
arts.sum: The club made the announcement after the 3-0 defeat.

arts.ttl: Ange sacked by Nottingham Forest within 20 minutes of Chelsea defeat as ruthless Evangelos Marinakis shows no mercy
arts.sum: The ex-Celtic boss has been axed after zero wins in his eight matches in charge at the City Ground
